title: Is there a way to syncronize twitch?
body: Lots of online friends want to watch the LCS together but everyone is always a few seconds apart. Is there a way to syncronize twitch?

replies.body: Buy a Big Screen. Attach an Xbox 360 or Xbox One to the TV. Install Twitch. Watch LCS. Everyone sees it at the same time! Profit?
works really well because people can see from 500 miles away and through the walls of my house.
if you can all manage to get to live or the exact same time
